statements: SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT feedback, treatment_effectiveness FROM assessments WHERE assessment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, user_id, assessment_date FROM assessments WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT feedback, treatment_effectiveness FROM assessments ORDER BY treatment_effectiveness DESC, assessment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, assessment_date, feedback FROM assessments WHERE treatment_effectiveness > 0.5 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(treatment_effectiveness) as avg_effectiveness FROM assessments GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 3;
SELECT id, user_id, feedback FROM assessments WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) as total_assessments FROM assessments GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_assessments DESC;
SELECT * FROM assessments;
SELECT assessment_id, patient_id, assessment_date, assessment_score FROM assessments WHERE assessment_score > 80;
SELECT survey_id, patient_id, survey_date FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE assessment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_date, assessment_score FROM assessments WHERE patient_id = '841f2b30-a64d-4ce3-a647-90adf0a07510';
SELECT * FROM assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_score FROM assessments WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT survey_id, patient_id, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM assessments JOIN surveys ON assessments.patient_id = surveys.patient_id;
SELECT AVG(assessment_score) AS avg_score, COUNT(*) AS total_assessments FROM assessments GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM assessments;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM assessments;
SELECT response_text, respondent_name FROM survey_responses;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM assessments WHERE assessment_id = 1;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name, assessment_date FROM assessments;
SELECT response_id, assessment_id, response_text, respondent_name, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name, response_text FROM assessments JOIN survey_responses ON assessments.assessment_id = survey_responses.assessment_id;

SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name, effectiveness_score FROM assessments JOIN treatment_effectiveness ON assessments.assessment_id = treatment_effectiveness.assessment_id WHERE effectiveness_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE assessment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_date, assessment_type FROM assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM survey_questions WHERE question_type = 'Multiple Choice'
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM survey_questions ORDER BY question_id
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT * FROM assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC, assessment_type ASC, assessment_score DESC
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_type, assessment_score FROM assessments WHERE assessment_score > 80 ORDER BY assessment_score DESC
SELECT assessments.*, survey_responses.response_text FROM assessments JOIN survey_responses ON assessments.patient_id = survey_responses.patient_id WHERE assessments.assessment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(assessment_id) AS total_assessments FROM assessments GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(assessment_id) >= 2 ORDER BY total_assessments DESC
SELECT patient_id, AVG(assessment_score) AS average_score FROM assessments GROUP BY patient_id HAVING AVG(assessment_score) > 60 ORDER BY average_score DESC
SELECT * FROM Assessment;
SELECT id, assessment_date, result FROM Assessment ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, assessment_type FROM Assessment WHERE assessment_type = 'Initial';
SELECT * FROM Survey WHERE satisfaction_level > 3 ORDER BY survey_date;
SELECT id, treatment_type, start_date, end_date FROM Treatment WHERE outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT * FROM Assessment ORDER BY assessment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, assessment_type, result FROM Assessment WHERE patient_id = 101 ORDER BY assessment_date ASC;
SELECT id, survey_date, satisfaction_level FROM Survey WHERE satisfaction_level >= 4 AND feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, treatment_type, start_date, end_date FROM Treatment WHERE treatment_type = 'Medication' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT Questionnaire.questionnaire_name, Answer.answer_text FROM Questionnaire JOIN Answer ON Questionnaire.id = Answer.questionnaire_id WHERE Answer.patient_id = 201 AND Questionnaire.questionnaire_name LIKE '%Satisfaction%' ORDER BY Answer.id ASC LIMIT 5;
